title: Legend of the Poro King icon
body: So i just unlocked the Champion of the Poros icon and i really want to use it, but it gives the normal poro look in-game. Now i love the Poros as much as the next LOL player but is it possible for the Champion Icon to give a separate skin for the poros in-game, so that i can show of some style with a wicked Poro.

replies.body: I agree with HeartVine. Show it off after the event. not now.
Or you could just not use the Champion of the Poros icon until snowdown is over. Riot didn't have to give us 'poro skins' but they did. Don't get greedy.
